casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cornelius TUCKER, Jr. No. 118P01-14. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

AMENDED

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of November 2005 by Defendant to proceed in forma pauperis:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2005."
